title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2 and KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), the scrollbars appear to be enabled. It is possible to move the scrollbars, but they have no effect. Even when opening a small image, such as an icon, the scrollbars are misleading because they do not perform any action.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2 and KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only). 
2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example. 
3. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect. 
4. Open a small image, such as an icon, to see that the scrollbars are misleading because they do not perform any action.
